title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Child and Family Agency) 
(Designation) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 July 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (child family agency) (designation) order 2021 (2) order come operation 1 july 2021

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 2. The Child and Family Agency is designated for the purposes of section
text_raw:
2. The Child and Family Agency is designated for the purposes of section 
29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 
13 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 child family agency designated purpose section 29 civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (no 13 2020)

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: 3. The Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020
text_raw:
3. The Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 
(Section 29) (Child and Family Agency) (Designation) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 118 
of 2021) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 June, 2021. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [311] 3

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion that it is
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 
29) (Child and Family Agency) (Designation) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 118 of 2021) 
is revoked and replaced by this Order.
